title: All activities which were previously existing shall be allowed to be relocated regardless of the non-conforming nature of the activities, except those which are hazardous and highly polluting, and except in cases where the alternative accommodation has already been allotted elsewhere by the Municipal Corporation
clause_text: All activities which were previously existing shall be allowed to be relocated regardless of the non-conforming nature of the activities, except those which are hazardous and highly polluting, and except in cases where the alternative accommodation has already been allotted elsewhere by the Municipal Corporation.
section: Commercial / Office / Shop / Economic Activity Free of Cost

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
